definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[נבא]] (√ of foll.; Ew Fl De Kö:Lgb ii, 1, 133 al. camp. Ar. naba0’a [naba0’a utter a low voice, or sound, (esp. of dog); announce; but also be exalted, elevated nab0’ah;un eminence); III, IV. acquaint, inform, naba0’a information announcement, intelligence]; As. nabû, call, proclaim, name, Dl:HWB 441; Eth. nababa: speak; Sab. [[תנבא]] ? cf. Levy-Os:ZMG xix. 1865, 208 CIS:iv. 1, No. 31; Ges Kue al. think weakened form of [[נבע]] bubble up, pour forth (of flow of words under excitement of inspiration); Hup Ri Sch cf. [[נאם]]; v. careful discussions by RS:Proph. ii, n. 18 Kö:OB i. 71 ff.)
